title: Add admin login button to landing page

requirements.summary: Add Internet Identity login button to the dashboard landing page that triggers authentication for admin access
acceptanceCriteria: Login button is visible on the dashboard page without requiring navigation to other pages
Button triggers Internet Identity authentication flow when clicked
Button shows appropriate states (logged in/logged out) based on authentication status
After successful login, user can access admin features

file_operations.description: Import and render the LoginButton component in a prominent location on the dashboard page. Add the button to the header area or near the top of the statistics section to ensure visibility on page load. The LoginButton component from frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx provides Internet Identity authentication with proper state management (logged in/logged out). Position the button so it does not interfere with existing person tabs, statistics cards, or the entries table. Ensure the button is responsive and works on both mobile and desktop viewports.

requirements.summary: Position the login button prominently on the dashboard page in the top-right area or header section
acceptanceCriteria: Login button is easily discoverable on page load
Button placement does not interfere with existing dashboard content (person tabs, statistics, entries table)
Button is responsive and works well on mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Adjust the layout structure to accommodate the LoginButton in a prominent, easily discoverable location such as the top-right corner of the page or within a header section above the person tabs. Use responsive CSS classes (Tailwind utilities) to ensure the button adapts to different screen sizes. Verify that the button placement does not overlap or interfere with the person tabs, statistics cards, entries table, or CSV export functionality.

requirements.summary: Reuse the existing LoginButton component for consistent authentication behavior across the application
acceptanceCriteria: LoginButton component is imported and rendered on DashboardPage
Authentication state is properly shared between dashboard and other pages
Logout functionality works correctly from the dashboard page

file_operations.description: Import the LoginButton component from frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx and integrate it into the DashboardPage. The LoginButton already handles Internet Identity authentication, login/logout state management, and query cache clearing on logout via the useInternetIdentity hook. No modifications to the LoginButton component itself are needed. Verify that authentication state is shared correctly across the application through the existing Internet Identity context provider, ensuring users can log in from the dashboard and access admin features on other pages (e.g., AdminPage, IncomeEntryPage) without re-authenticating.
